name: Security Plan Rating Rubric
description: Specialized rubric for security-critical plans with emphasis on risk mitigation and compliance

dimensions.name: completeness
dimensions.description: All required security information present, no gaps in threat model or security requirements

scoring.1-3: Major gaps in threat model, security requirements, or compliance documentation
scoring.4-6: Some gaps in security documentation, but core security elements present
scoring.7-8: Complete security documentation with minor clarifications needed
scoring.9-10: Comprehensive security documentation with threat model, risk assessment, and compliance mapping

dimensions.name: feasibility
dimensions.description: Security controls are realistic and achievable with available tools and resources

scoring.1-3: Unrealistic security controls or unproven security technologies
scoring.4-6: Some concerns about security control feasibility or implementation complexity
scoring.7-8: Achievable security controls with proven technologies
scoring.9-10: Highly feasible security controls with clear implementation path and vendor support

dimensions.name: risk_mitigation
dimensions.description: All security risks identified with comprehensive mitigation strategies, fallback plans, and incident response procedures

scoring.1-3: No security risk consideration or mitigation strategies
scoring.4-6: Some security risks identified, limited mitigation strategies
scoring.7-8: Good security risk analysis with mitigation plans and incident response procedures
scoring.9-10: Comprehensive security risk management with proactive monitoring, threat intelligence, and automated response

dimensions.name: security_coverage
dimensions.description: Security requirements fully addressed across authentication, authorization, encryption, data protection, and monitoring

scoring.1-3: Missing critical security controls or incomplete security coverage
scoring.4-6: Basic security controls present but gaps in coverage or depth
scoring.7-8: Good security coverage with authentication, authorization, encryption, and monitoring
scoring.9-10: Comprehensive security coverage with defense-in-depth, zero-trust architecture, and security automation

dimensions.name: compliance
dimensions.description: Plan meets all compliance requirements (GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2, PCI-DSS, etc.) with audit trail and documentation

scoring.1-3: No compliance consideration or missing critical compliance requirements
scoring.4-6: Some compliance requirements addressed but gaps in documentation or audit trail
scoring.7-8: Good compliance coverage with documentation and audit trail
scoring.9-10: Comprehensive compliance coverage with automated compliance monitoring and reporting
